```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}

setwd("~/Documents/thieu")
students <- read_csv("qualtrics.csv")
qual.par <-read_csv("rds12_qualtrics.csv")
qual.par
nrow(students)
nrow(qual.par)


students$group <- "Students"
qual.par$group <-"Online participants"
```

```{r}
masterdata <- bind_rows(students, qual.par)
masterdata
```
DERS plot
```{r}
DERShist <- ggplot(data=masterdata, aes(x=ders_total, fill=group)) + 
                     geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~group, scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Difficulties in Emotion Regulation (DERS)") +
geom_vline(xintercept=mean(masterdata$ders_total), linetype = "dashed") 
  
DERShist
```
 Dashed line is mean value 
 
 
```{r}
DERSsummary <- masterdata %>% group_by(group) %>% summarise(median= median(ders_total), mean = mean(ders_total), sd=sd(ders_total), n=n(), missing= sum(is.na(ders_total)))

DERSsummary


```
 
 
 
 
 
 PANAS negative affect
```{r}
PANASneghist <- ggplot(data=masterdata, aes(x=i_panas_sf_neg, fill=group)) + 
                     geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~group, scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Negative affect from Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS)") + geom_vline(xintercept=mean(masterdata$i_panas_sf_neg, na.rm = TRUE), linetype = "dashed") + theme(axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = 0))
PANASneghist
```
 Dashed line is mean value 


```{r}
PANASnegsummary <- masterdata %>% group_by(group) %>% summarise(median= median(i_panas_sf_neg, na.rm=TRUE), mean = mean(i_panas_sf_neg, na.rm=TRUE), sd=sd(i_panas_sf_neg, na.rm = TRUE), n=n(), missing= sum(is.na(i_panas_sf_neg)))
PANASnegsummary
```


 
 PANAS positive affect
```{r}
PANASposhist <- ggplot(data=masterdata, aes(x=i_panas_sf_pos, fill=group)) + 
                     geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~group, scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Positive affect from Positive and Negative Affect Schedule (PANAS)") + geom_vline(xintercept=mean(masterdata$i_panas_sf_pos, na.rm = TRUE), linetype = "dashed") + theme(axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = 0))
PANASposhist
```

```{r}
PANASpossummary <- masterdata %>% group_by(group) %>% summarise(median= median(i_panas_sf_pos, na.rm=TRUE), mean = mean(i_panas_sf_pos, na.rm=TRUE), sd=sd(i_panas_sf_pos, na.rm = TRUE), n=n(), missing= sum(is.na(i_panas_sf_pos)))
PANASpossummary
```
 
 
 
 

 TAS
```{r}
TAShist <- ggplot(data=masterdata, aes(x=tas20_total, fill=group)) + 
                     geom_histogram() + facet_wrap(~group, scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Toronto Alexithymia Scale (TAS)") +  geom_vline(xintercept=mean(masterdata$tas20_total, na.rm = TRUE), linetype = "dashed") + theme(axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = 0))
TAShist
```
Dashed line is mean value

```{r}
TASsummary <- masterdata %>% group_by(group) %>% summarise(median= median(tas20_total, na.rm=TRUE), mean = mean(tas20_total, na.rm=TRUE), sd=sd(tas20_total, na.rm = TRUE), n=n(), missing= sum(is.na(tas20_total)))
TASsummary
```
